original_text: Think about these examples: A soldier never has to pay for his own food and clothes. A farmer who plants vines will eat some of the grapes. A person who takes care of sheep or goats will drink some of the milk from those animals. You know that is what always happens.
korean_text: 누가 자기 비용으로 군 복무를 하겠느냐 누가 포도를 심고 그 열매를 먹지 않겠느냐 누가 양 떼를 기르고 그 양 떼의 젖을 먹지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: A soldier never has to pay
for his own food and clothes.
will eat some of the grapes.
A person who takes care of sheep or goats
will drink some of the milk
You know that is what always happens.
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분은 그것이 항상 일어나는 일임을 압니다
